#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
void LPSArray(string str)
{
    long long int l =str.length();
    long long int *lps = (long long int *)malloc(sizeof(long long int)*l);
    long long int len=0,i=1;
    lps[0] = 0;
    if(l-1!=0)
        cout<<lps[0]<<" ";
    while(i<l)
    {
        if(str[i]==str[len])
        {
            len++;
            lps[i] = len;
            if(i!=l-1)
                cout<<lps[i]<<" ";
            i++;
        }
        else
        {
            if(len!=0)
                len = lps[len-1];
            else
            {
                lps[i]=0;
                if(i!=l-1)
                    cout<<lps[i]<<" ";
                i++;
            }
        }
    }
    i--;
    cout<<lps[i]<<endl;

}
int main()
{
    string str;
    cin>>str;
    while(str.compare("End")!=0)
    {
        LPSArray(str);
        cin>>str;
    }
    return 0;
}
